means: 呼呼作声，以呼呼声催促

sentence.Network_en: Cheers for Hong Kong's return and Marco's prosperity. Whish them to a more splendid future!
sentence.Network_cn: 让我们为香港回归和澳门的繁荣而干杯, 祝愿它们的明天更美好.

sentence.Network_en: I whish you, who love me and whom i love, health and happiness!
sentence.Network_cn: 祝愿你们, 所有爱我的与我爱的人, 身体健康、幸福快乐!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《英语单词因缘记忆系统》方法说明 ... whirry 急送，赶紧 whish 飕飕声 whist 嘘，静的.
whirr 呼呼声whish 呼呼声whisht 无声的
噗哧_百度百科 ... 噗通〖 flop,thump〗 哧溜〖 whish〗 噗哧〖 soundsoflaughter,etc.〗.

auth_sentence.content: I whish a future without war and conflicts.
